articles.image_title: Vor Beginn der Vorpremiere des Arte/RBB-Dokumentarfilms "Nina Hagen - Godmother of Punk" stehen Nina Hagen (l) und Mutter Eva-Maria Hagen am Donnerstag (11.08.2011) vor dem Babylon Kino in Berlin. articles.title: Extremhitze und Trockenheit auch in den USA
articles.image_title: August 4, 2022: The National Weather Service in NYC announced a heat advisory for extreme temeratures and humidity over the course of few days create dangerous conditions that can lead to heat stress and illness. People outdoor activities specially children around crystal fountains at Domino Park in Williamsburg,Brooklyn.in New York City temperatures remain in the 90's on Thursday and will remain for next few days.
